thanks for the upload of Governor of Poker 2. i've installed this a few weeks ago. at first (yellow cities) it worked perfectly but when i reached orange cities, it seemed to stop working after a player changes/transfers to another table. would you please tell me what's wrong and remedy of the problem? is there anyone having the same problem?

Here is the answer about the game locking up at the end:

The game lockup in El-Paso has been resolved in the later version (v1.8 is current. Issue was fixed in v1.6).
We also added a check to try and get the profile playing again for the players with a "stuck"-save file, but apparently this doesn't fix the savefile for all the players.

At this point the best/fastest thing to do is to start a new profile.
The lockup is fixed and shouldn't appear when playing the new profile.

With kind regards,

Dennis

This is a buggy version of the game.  Once you get past the first cities and begin playing multi-table tournaments, players who just won the pot will often leave the table before collecting their chips, which causes the game to get stuck.

This IS a great game but this particular version must be outdated - it'd be nearly impossible to actually beat this one.
